alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Haakon; Jackson; Mellette; Pennington Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 10:38PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Haakon, northwestern Mellette, Jackson, north central Bennett and southeastern Pennington Counties through 1130 PM MDT/1230 AM CDT/... At 1038 PM MDT/1138 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ottumwa to 7 miles southeast of Philip to 2 miles west of Interior. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ottumwa around 1045 PM MDT. Midland around 1055 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Belvidere, Wanblee and George Town. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 130 and 173. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT/100 AM CDT/ for south central, southwestern and west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Haakon; Jackson; Mellette; Pennington Co Plains
